General Info

What is investing?

Investing is the act of putting time, money or anything of value into something in hopes of making profit. For example, when you buy shares of a company you use your money. Then when the prices for that share go up, you sell it, to make a profit. Another example is if you want to start a business you need to put in time and money to create it. Investing happens everywhere in life; however, this website will teach you how to successfully invest in wall street by buying share of companies.

About Us We are some noobie coders who wanted to test their coding skills by making a website. We are also knowledgeable on aspects of business; more specifically investing. Using these two skills we hope to enlighten people in the ways of investing, and to learn more about programming. Why We Made This Website We made this website for multiple reasons. First, of which to learn how to code, but more specifically practice it. Second, to spread knowledge of investing and strategies for success in that area. Lastly, we hope to get feedback and hone our skills of coding for making future websites. What We Hope To Accomplish Again we hope to improve our coding skills for future websites. Also, if possible we would like to help people with investing by warning them of scams and teaching how to invest. We hope to make people money or at least inform people with an interest for investing.
